page.title: 10FAMILY LIFE 7.
page.content: During the week we are usually up at about 6.30 a.m. in order for us all to wash, dress and have breakfast before going to school or work. After every one has left I settle myself in my 'office'.My mother-in-law and I usually have a cup of tea or coffee mid-morning and then a sandwich or snack at lunchtime (about 12.30 to 1.00 p.m.) This could be cold meat or a spread of some description, or toast with baked beans or pilchards on top,or perhaps some hot soup with French bread (a long crispy loaf of bread).We usually also have a piece of cake and a cup of tea.The children take sandwiches to school for their lunch also some cake and a piece of fruit, which I prepare in the morning. They also take a drink in a flask (a container designed to keep drinks hot or cold).
